Package votebox.middle.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDrawable
    From the perspective of the view, an IDrawable is any object which can be drawn to the display.
    IEventHandler
    An instance of this class handles an event generated in the view.
    IFocusable
    Some IDrawables have additional view-related behavior which stems from the fact that some IDrawables are actually "buttons," or user interface controls.
    IView
    The IView is an interface that allows for the drawing of a Drawable element to the display.
    IViewFactory
    Use an instance of this class to construct a view and images that work with the constructed view.
    IViewImage
    Abstract interface for an image.
    IViewManager
    Other classes that make use of the ViewManager should program to this abstraction, and not to the concrete ViewManager class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AView  
    AWTImage
    This is a wrapper for the AWT Image class, BufferedImage.
    AWTView  
    AWTViewFactory
    This is the factory for the AWTView.
    InputEvent
    An event is our encapsulation of an input device event.
    Layout
    This class encapsulates the notion of "layout." A layout is essentially a group of properties parsed from the layout xml file, and an ordered list of RenderPages that can be drawn to the display.
    LayoutParser
    This class encapsulates the layout XML parser.
    RenderPage
    A RenderPage consists of a list of drawables.
    ViewManager
    The ViewManager is our top level view encapsulation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BallotBoxViewException
    All exceptions which eminate from the view will be thrown in the form of a BallotBoxViewException.
    DuplicateUIDException
    This exception is thrown when a UID is declared more than once, and it is a bad thing.
    LayoutParserException
    An exception of this type denotes an exception that was caused by the layout XML parser.
    MeaninglessMethodException
    This method is a built-in "class cast exception." Some methods on drawables only have meaning on certain kinds of drawables.
    UnsupportedLanguageException
    This exception is thrown when a language is required that is not supported.
